page.title: 12PUBS CONTINUED /EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The Chequers pub is situated opposite Slaugham Church.It has a childrens room and restaurant. They sell King & Barnes beer and they sell about 100 gallons of beer in a week.The pub has a catchment area of about 25 miles. {EMPLOYMENT} People who live in the Warninglid, Slaugham and Staplefield areas have a wide range of jobs.There are job opportunities in the area for working on farms or in the Happy Eater, Handcross Garden Centre, in pubs or in schools.We found that most people worked outside of the area in which they lived.The jobs they had varied from Accountants ,Engineers ,Mechanics ,Business Analyst ,Farmers ,Financial consultant ,Medical secretary ,Graphic designer ,Doctor ,Airline pilot.There were 14 retired people living there.
